title: North Korean Weapons Launch Showed Off Vital Piece of Kim Jong Un’s Ambitions
sub_head: New hypersonic missile has fuel system that makes deployment faster and more mobile
body:
SEOUL—In January, Kim Jong Un outlined the ambitions for a new five-year weapons strategy, promising technology the world has never seen. The aim, he said, was to place North Korea’s war-fighting capabilities and deterrence “on the highest level.”
On Wednesday, North Korean state media confirmed that a pillar of Mr. Kim’s plan had gotten its first public showcase.
